home.hero_title: Master the art of the kitchen

shipping.title: Free Worldwide Shipping
shipping.description: Free shipping to all over the world with many specials only for our dear customers

quality.title: Best Quality Product
quality.description: Many customers entrust various kitchen appliances needs to us, and customer satisfaction is our pride.

price.title: Super Affordable Price
price.description: You can get various kitchen appliances of quality at affordable prices

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.sub_title_bot: Our team will be ready to help you find the perfect kitchen appliance for you.

about.title: The Story of Kitchy
about.sub_title: Kitchy was born from a simple idea: why should the best kitchen appliances be a luxury? As passionate food lovers, we decided to cut out the middlemen to offer you top brands and cutting-edge technology at finally fair prices.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Based in Paris, we select each product for its design and performance. Our mission is to transform every home into a chef's kitchen, with free worldwide delivery and a service that puts your satisfaction first.
